mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_schedule(content, title, start_time, end_time, address, public_type, schedule_type, latitude, longitude, is_completed, user_id) Values(#{content}, #{title}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{address}, #{publicType}, 0, #{latitude}, #{longitude}, 0, #{userId})
mapper.select: SELECT id,content, title, start_time, end_time, address, public_type, schedule_type, latitude, longitude, is_completed, user_id FROM user_schedule WHERE user_id = #{value}

SELECT id, content, title, start_time, end_time, address, public_type, schedule_type, latitude, longitude, is_completed, user_id FROM user_schedule WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND start_time BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime}
